closed_reason: Added tick-detail-drawer component to tick-board.ts template. The drawer was not being rendered even though selectedTick state existed. Added state for notes, blockers, and parent title. Modified handleTickSelected to fetch full tick details via fetchTick API and added handleDrawerClose to clear state.
description:
When clicking on a tick card in the board, the detail drawer doesn't open. The tick-selected event may not be wired up correctly to open the drawer.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open tk board
2. Click on any tick card
3. Expected: Detail drawer slides in from right
4. Actual: Nothing happens

Check tick-board.ts handleTickSelected and drawer open logic.
title: Fix: Clicking tick card doesn't open detail drawer
